file_content.text: Secret mission = successful // You = talented operative
Master Satele = wants you on Carrick Station // Secret mission = keep to yourself!
Kaysixpee = confirming identities // Your team = high-level classified mission experience
Kaysixpee = confirming identity // You = noteworthy classified mission veteran
Recording = commencing + for your eyes only
This is Jedi Grand Master Satele Shan, requesting immediate assistance from my most trusted contacts. There is a powerful dark side threat we must confront.
This mission will be unlike anything you've previously encountered. If your will is strong and you've mastered your fear, contact me at Carrick Station.
Master Satele spoke of a dark side threat. That's all I needed to hear. I'm on my way.
She can count on me.
You = faced Sith many times + survived // You = perfect mission candidate
"There is no emotion, there is only peace." The dark side has no power over me.
Jedi have no fear. I'll go.
You = faced dark side threats before // You = ideal mission candidate
They burned the fear out of me in basic training. Whatever the mission is, I'm in.
Havoc Squad is always ready.
Havoc Squad = gaining reputation for achieving impossible // Kaysixpee = recommending you for promotion
Fear? Please--I've seen a naked Rodian. Willpower? Well, how attractive is the enemy?
Sounds like my kind of work.
Mission opportunities for social interaction = minimal // You = safe
She's taken the Jedi reputation for being cryptic and run with it.
Could she be more vague?
Comm channel = not secure // Sith Empire agents = everywhere
I don't have time for this.
Threat level = extreme // Mission priority = critical
You = travel to Carrick Station immediately + contact Grand Master Satele Shan // Secondary objective = keep this meeting confidential
Kaysixpee = on secret mission // You = tell no one
